trans-unit.resname: WOC·1 | Tegwyll, Duke of Splendor | Card Name
WOC·1 | Tegwyll, Duke of Splendor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
WOC·1 | Tegwyll, Duke of Splendor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他仙灵得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·1 | Tegwyll, Duke of Splendor | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever another Faerie you control dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个由你操控的仙灵死去时，你抓一张牌且失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·2 | Ellivere of the Wild Court | Card Name
WOC·2 | Ellivere of the Wild Court | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, create a Virtuous Role token attached to another target creature you control. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control.)
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME进战场或攻击时，派出一个善人角色衍生物，并贴附在另一个目标由你操控的生物上。（如果其上已有另一个你操控的角色，则将已有之角色置入坟墓场。你每操控一个结界，所结附的生物便得+1/+1。）

trans-unit.resname: WOC·2 | Ellivere of the Wild Court | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever an enchanted creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控且受有灵气的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·3 | Alela, Cunning Conqueror | Card Name
WOC·3 | Alela, Cunning Conqueror | Card Text | Paragraph 1
WOC·3 | Alela, Cunning Conqueror | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, create a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放每个对手回合中你的第一个咒语时，派出一个1/1黑色，具飞行异能的仙灵／浪客衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·3 | Alela, Cunning Conqueror | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more Faeries you control deal combat damage to a player, goad target creature that player controls.
trans-unit.target: 每当由你操控的一个或数个仙灵对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，煽惑目标由该牌手操控的生物。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·4 | Gylwain, Casting Director | Card Name
WOC·4 | Gylwain, Casting Director | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, choose one —
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME或另一个非衍生物的生物在你的操控下进战场时，选择一项～

trans-unit.resname: WOC·4 | Gylwain, Casting Director | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: • Create a Royal Role token attached to that creature.
trans-unit.target: •派出一个皇族角色衍生物并贴附在该生物上。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·4 | Gylwain, Casting Director | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: • Create a Sorcerer Role token attached to that creature.
trans-unit.target: •派出一个术士角色衍生物并贴附在该生物上。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·4 | Gylwain, Casting Director | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: • Create a Monster Role token attached to that creature.
trans-unit.target: •派出一个怪物角色衍生物并贴附在该生物上。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·21 | Court of Ardenvale | Card Name
WOC·21 | Court of Ardenvale | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你成为君主。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·21 | Court of Ardenvale | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand. If you're the monarch, return that permanent card to the battlefield instead.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，将目标法术力值等于或小于3的永久物牌从你坟墓场移回你手上。若你是君主，则改为将该永久物牌移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·22 | Court of Vantress | Card Name
WOC·22 | Court of Vantress | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你成为君主。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·22 | Court of Vantress | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose up to one other target enchantment or artifact. If you're the monarch, you may create a token that's a copy of it. If you're not the monarch, you may have CARDNAME become a copy of it, except it has this ability.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，选择至多另一个目标结界或神器。若你是君主，则你可以派出一个为其复制品的衍生物。若你不是君主，则你可以使CARDNAME成为其复制品，但它具有此异能。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·23 | Court of Locthwain | Card Name
WOC·23 | Court of Locthwain | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你成为君主。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·23 | Court of Locthwain | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of target opponent's library. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it. If you're the monarch, until end of turn, you may cast a spell from among cards exiled with CARDNAME without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，放逐目标对手的牌库顶牌。于该牌持续放逐的时段内，你可以使用该牌，且能用任意种类的法术力来施放。若你是君主，则直到回合结束，你可以从以CARDNAME放逐的牌之中施放一个咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·24 | Court of Embereth | Card Name
WOC·24 | Court of Embereth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你成为君主。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·24 | Court of Embereth | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 3/1 red Knight creature token. Then if you're the monarch, CARDNAME deals X damage to each opponent, where X is the number of creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，派出一个3/1红色骑士衍生生物。然后若你是君主，则CARDNAME向每位对手各造成X点伤害，X为由你操控的生物数量。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·25 | Court of Garenbrig | Card Name
WOC·25 | Court of Garenbrig | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你成为君主。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·25 | Court of Garenbrig | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, distribute two +1/+1 counters among up to two target creatures. Then if you're the monarch, double the number of +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，将两个+1/+1指示物分配给至多两个目标生物。然后若你是君主，则将每个由你操控的生物上之+1/+1指示物数量加倍。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·26 | Korvold, Gleeful Glutton | Card Name
WOC·26 | Korvold, Gleeful Glutton | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each card type among permanents you've sacrificed this turn.
trans-unit.target: 你本回合中牺牲的永久物间每有一种牌张类别，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·26 | Korvold, Gleeful Glutton | Card Text | Paragraph 2
WOC·26 | Korvold, Gleeful Glutton | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever Korvold deals combat damage to a player, put X +1/+1 counters on Korvold and draw X cards, where X is the number of permanent types among cards in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 每当寇沃对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，在寇沃上放置X个+1/+1指示物且抓X张牌，X为你坟墓场中牌的永久物类别数量。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·27 | Brenard, Ginger Sculptor | Card Name
WOC·27 | Brenard, Ginger Sculptor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each creature you control that's a Food or a Golem gets +2/+2 and has trample.
trans-unit.target: 每个由你操控且为食品或魔像的生物均得+2/+2且具有践踏异能。

trans-unit.resname: WOC·27 | Brenard, Ginger Sculptor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, you may exile it. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's a 1/1 Food Golem artifact creature in addition to its other types and it has "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life."
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，你可以将它放逐。若你如此作，则派出一个为该生物复制品的衍生物，但它是1/1食品／魔像神器生物，仍具有原本类别，且具有「{2}，{T}，牺牲此神器：你获得3点生命。」

WOC·28 | Throne of Eldraine | Card Text | Paragraph 1

WOC·41 | Liberated Livestock | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, create a 1/1 white Cat creature token with lifelink, a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying, and a 2/4 white Ox creature token. For each of those tokens, you may put an Aura card from your hand and/or graveyard onto the battlefield attached to it.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，派出一个1/1白色、具系命异能的猫衍生生物，一个1/1白色、具飞行异能的鸟衍生生物和一个2/4白色的牛衍生生物。对每个这类衍生物而言，你可以将一张灵气牌从你手上和／或你坟墓场放进战场并贴附于其上。

WOC·42 | Ox Drover | Card Text | Paragraph 1
WOC·42 | Ox Drover | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked by Oxen.

WOC·43 | Songbirds' Blessing | Card Text | Paragraph 2
